actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Trade Development and Assistance Act of 1954.

summary.text: Amends the Agricultural Trade Development and Assistance Act of 1954 to prohibit the distribution of agricultural commodities to foreign nations for food relief programs unless the Secretary of Agriculture determines that adequate storage facilities are available in the recipient country to prevent spoilage or waste and the distribution of the commodity will not result in a significant decrease in the price of the commodity in the recipient country.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Trade Development and Assistance Act of 1954.
